data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Goias in their own half.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In the minute 8, Goias have a goal kick.
In Goiania Goias attack through Ignacio Jara. The finish is off target, however.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Throw-in Goias.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira waits before resuming play because Victor Andrade for Goias is still down.
Throw-in high up the field for Goias in Goiania.
Goias's Jefferson breaks free at Serra Dourada. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
In the minute 12, Thiago Larghi (Goias) has taken off Victor Andrade who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Mike is the replacement.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Goias drives forward and Jefferson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Fluminense needs to be cautious. Goias have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 14, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
Fluminense to take a throw-in in Goias territory.
In the minute 17, In Goiania Fluminense's Igor Juliao is caught offside.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goias's Breno gets in a shot on goal at Serra Dourada. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 19, Goias have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Goias have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Goias are on the attack at Serra Dourada, where Edilson is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In the minute 20, Goias have a dangerous throw-in.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira blows against Fluminense's Fred for offside.
In the minute 21, Can Goias get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fluminense's half?
Goal! Rafael Moura gives Goias a 1-0 lead in Goiania.
That's a fine assist from Vinicius Lopes.
In the minute 23, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Breno (Goias) gets a yellow card.
Vinicius Lopes (Goias) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 24, Can Goias capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Edilson for Goias gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Fluminense at Serra Dourada.
In the minute 26, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a throw-in for Fluminense, close to Goias's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 30, Goias have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Goiania.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goias.
In the minute 33, Yago Felipe (Fluminense) has received a first yellow card.
Goias are pushing forward but Ratinho's finish is wide of the goal.
Fluminense have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Goias in the half of Fluminense.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Goias goal kick.
In the minute 37, Free kick Fluminense.
Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, At Serra Dourada, Ratinho has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In Goiania, Digao (Fluminense) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
In the minute 40, Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Goal! Fluminense go level at 1-1 through Yago Felipe in Goiania.
Hudson instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 42, It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 43, Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Fernando Pacheco (Fluminense) has received a yellow card from Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In Goiania a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
Fluminense are caught offside.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Caju is on a sub for Ignacio Jara for Goias.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Fernando Pacheco with Caio Paulista.
Corner awarded to Goias.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goias needs to be cautious. Fluminense have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 51, Igor Juliao of Fluminense gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Goias at Serra Dourada.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a Fluminense throw-in in Goias's half.
In the minute 52, Fluminense's Fred scores with his head to give his side a 1-2 lead.
Caio Paulista with an assist there.
Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 55, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Throw-in for Goias in the half of Fluminense.
Free kick for Goias in the half of Fluminense.
In the minute 58, Free kick Fluminense.
Fluminense's Dodi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Goias a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Goias are coming forward and Fabio Sanches gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Goiania.
Goias awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 62, Can Goias capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fluminense's half?
Goal kick for Fluminense at Serra Dourada.
Rafael Moura for Goias drives towards goal at Serra Dourada. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 64, Goias have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
In Goiania, Rafael Moura of Goias is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Goias have been given a penalty at Serra Dourada...
In the minute 67, The match is now all square at 2-2 thanks to a penalty from Rafael Moura.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 70, Goal! Nene gives Fluminense a 2-3 lead.
Great play from Hudson to set up the goal.
Felippe Cardoso is replacing Fred for the away team.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
In the minute 73, Goias make their third substitution with Daniel replacing Ratinho.
Shaylon is replacing Jefferson for the home team.
In the minute 74, Throw-in Fluminense.
Throw-in Fluminense.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Goias's half?
In the minute 75, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fluminense.
Digao puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-4.
Danilo Barcelos instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 78, Goias to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Igor Juliao for Fluminense who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 80, Igor Juliao is back on his feet again.
Corner awarded to Goias.
Goias's Mike misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 82, Fluminense have a goal kick.
Free kick Goias.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Goias in their own half.
In the minute 84, Luiz Flavio de Oliveira awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Goiania to check on Rafael Moura, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 86, The home team have replaced Mike with Vidal. This is the fifth substitution made today by Thiago Larghi.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Rafael Moura is back on the pitch.
In the minute 89, Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a third change, with Daniel replacing the possibly injured Igor Juliao.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Goias awarded a free kick in their own half.
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Goiania.
Hudson for the away team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Goias in their own half.
Goias's Vinicius Lopes misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Fluminense goal kick.
Ball safe as Goias is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Fluminense in the half of Goias.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Luiz Flavio de Oliveira.
Luiz Flavio de Oliveira signals a throw-in for Fluminense, close to Goias's area.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Fluminense close to the penalty box.
The match has come to a close in Goiania. The final score is 2-4.
Fluminense make their fourth substitution with Wisney replacing Hudson.
Christian is replacing Nene for Fluminense at Serra Dourada.
